basics.name: Nadine Fischoff
basics.label: Web Developer, Data Analyst
basics.summary: Full stack web developer and data analyst with experience in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, R and SQL. I discovered web development through my work with government and policy analysis, and use programming to help organizations automate processes and retrieve, organize, and understand their data. Passionate about all things related to coding, health, and politics, I also developed five iOS apps as a side project while learning to code.

summary.first: Use R and SQL to automate the creation of datasets to help determine portions of school funding related to the Career and Technical Education (CTE) program
summary.second: Use R, RMarkdown, and SQL to automate the creation of reports with demographic, enrollment, and funding data for schools in the CTE portfolio
summary.third: Develop research documents for the CTE program, with demographic and school performance data
